text.__SUMMARY__: Hypericum bupleuroides is a species of perennial herb in the St. John's wort family, Hypericaceae. It is the sole species in the section Hypericum sect. Bupleuroides.
text.Description: The species grows up to 75 centimeters tall. It has red or black stems and five petals, also red or black.
text.Distribution:
The species is found in northeast Turkey and Russia, although it is very rare.
